comments:
I20071101-2000

Given (java project with JUnit4 on bp):
package test;
import org.junit.Test;
public class OtherTests {

	@Test
	public void otherTest() throws Exception {
		
	}
}
1. Run OtherTests as JUnit Test
2. Rename OtherTests

Probably a debug bug
Looks like a problem in the launch config rename participant
I was not able to reproduce. What workspace setting do you have for "Run/Debug Settings > Launch > Launch Configurations : Delete configurations when associated resource is deleted"?

(In reply to comment #3)
> I was not able to reproduce. What workspace setting do you have for "Run/Debug
> Settings > Launch > Launch Configurations : Delete configurations when
